description: Try our easy to follow Jacket Potatoes with Bacon & Mint Dressing recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Jacket Potatoes with Bacon & Mint Dressing
name: Jacket Potatoes with Bacon & Mint Dressing Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Remove potatoes from foil. Cut a cross on top of each one. Squeeze potato up from the base so that the inside is exposed. Spoon a dollop of bacon mixture on top and serve.
